item.title: Every time i kill slayer monster it logs me out!
item.dc:creator: @eric_owner2 eric owner2
item.description:
@eric_owner2 wrote:

Ok i just added slayer to my server…and here is my code for crawling hand:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1655) { //crawling hand int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; try{ ppl.addSkillXP(1000, 18); } catch(Exception E) { ppl.addSkillXP(1000, 18); } }

Now every time i kill it, it logs me out…but i still get the xp. Can somone help me.
please?
thanks

~eric
